title: Notwithstanding anything contained in these regulations, there shall be no cap for utilization of available in-situ FSI / and (1) Premium FSI and TDR potential of the entire plot on the remaining plot
clause_text: Notwithstanding anything contained in these regulations, there shall be no cap for utilization of available in-situ FSI / and (1) Premium FSI and TDR potential of the entire plot on the remaining plot.
section: General conditions / notes to allow development under above regulations :-
